meanings.meaning: having all your body needs/a pleasant life

examples: a quilted cover for added comfort
I dress for comfort rather than glamour.
I like to travel in reasonable comfort.

words: in the comfort of your own home
examples: The hotel offers a high standard of comfort. The sound of gunfire was too close for comfort.

meanings.meaning: help/kindness to sb who is suffering

examples: A drop in the unemployment rate was cold comfort for those without a job
His kind words brought some comfort to the grieving parents.
They sought comfort in each other. We took great comfort from the fact that at least some of our savings were safe.
Chocolate is a great comfort food.

meanings.meaning: sb/sth that helps when you are suffering, etc.

examples: The children have been a great comfort to me through all of this.
I hate camping?I miss all my creature comforts.
